TOl9HYXcMfwu9FkF1HEitA.text: Came here for lunch with my friend and her daughter. It was pretty busy so there was a little wait. The inside is nice and decorative. It was cozy. We got sat down and we ordered our lunch I believe Juan was our server. We asked for ice water with lemon and he didn't bring it until we had to ask for it the second time. My friend ordered her pizza without red onions and he forgot to note that down because her pizza came out with red onions. I also ordered the Mediterranean salad with my meal but somehow it was Caesar so he had to switch it out. I also found a small piece of hair in my salad and took it out but I didn't complain about it. The pizzas we all ordered was really good. The appetizers plate that are set at each table before you sat down, one of them was dirty so we didn't use any of the plates that was already there. Our server probably only checked on us once throughout our whole meal. I would definitely recommend they work on better customer service. I gave this place 2 stars for lack of service we got but the food was delicious as it should be. I would like to give this location another try but I like the California pizza on the strip better.

photos.caption: Photo of California Pizza Kitchen at Town Square Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My lunch meal

Sdld1-i-CCUXq8FaedWoig.text: Service was awesome as always but when you walk in and it's so warm you see waiters fanning themselves with menus and they tell you it's because outside is really hot then you hear them tell someone else it's cause the a/c is only working on one side of the restaurant then 1 minute later she tells another guest the a/c don't work I don't know what to believe. I don't know how you can leave a restaurant open when it's over 100 degrees outside and your a/c don't work. A warning would have been nice. Put it this way, it's so hot I didn't even finish my food, or order my butter cake!!

RUKa4KO62Zsv3k63hzu8bw.text: This is my favorite location! Service and atmosphere is average, nothing wrong with that. We always come here before or after a movie. My boyfriend knows the usual, we start off with the avocado egg rolls (anything with bacon is amazing), Thai crunch salad gives a good balance to what we share, and the chefs make the best jambalaya (crawfish included yum!). We get the spicy buffalo chicken or meat lovers pizza when we're feeling hungry&bold. These plates are pretty big and perfect to share, especially when you're with your love ones (limit to one plate, BORING!). I recommend signing up for the CPK rewards point system, rack up points even  if you don't come often, get free treats or small plates.

qSoWVneAvrSgiqcstfBJMg.text: I've been to one of their restaurants several times, but this was a first time for my husband.  We started with some of the avocado egg rolls, which we both loved. The spicy dipping sauce was tasty!  My husband opted for the ribeye with blue cheese butter and it came out overcooked.  They immediately corrected the order and it was very good.  I ordered the pear and Gorgonzola pizza, which I have ordered before.  It was delicious as usual.  We did have a few drinks and they were good as well.  We did not have room for dessert, but they had some delicious choices.  The new bar area looks really nice and our service was good.  We will go back!

R6hTkZ1XHn557Wq8mhI2OQ.text: Great food! I know they're specialized in pizza here so I wanted to try something different, I went with one of the salads and the crispy macaroni balls and with sangria. IT WAS AMAZING! Everything was on point. And the service was top notch. GGWP BOYS. HASHTAG: GAME OVER.

6DIijzpEUmP1R3oetIDsvA.text: Gave them 5 stars because I have absolutely nothing to complain about. First time I came here was for a special dinner for one of my coworker. We had roughly 25 people there. The waiter was extremely nice and patient with us which I really appreciate because I know with so many of us in one group we were really loud and needy haha. He constantly kept our waters filled and our bread coming. The free bread they give there with a side of butter and dipping oil they serve is so good he served us three rounds! Overall the service was great and the food was even better. I've only tried the Hawaiian pizza and the Habanero carnitas pizza but from the quality of both I am looking to trying out the rest of their menu. My favorite is the habanero carnitas and I've been craving it ever since. I am in love haha

OrRNvVpgP3TetdSgHxLPAg.text: Great lunch. After buying gift cards for others I finally had lunch. There was 9 of us and there was not a disappointed one in the bunch. From pizza to salad it was all fresh and full of flavor. I will be back.

FP-ziN_Z0d2MvAO97j9iGg.text: This was the first time visiting this location. I went at around 3pm with a friend. It was pretty slow inside. Not many people at tables. The place was very clean and the employees I seen were tiding up the place and helping customers. Our waiter was Miguel and he was very nice. He brought our drinks and bread quick and took our order which was just a pizza. The food was brought to our table in a matter of minutes. The bbq chicken pizza was excellent. Miguel checked in several times to make sure we had everything, drinks refilled, and that our food was ok. After the service and quality of food was excellent, I will come back.

_lgRZUkqZ-fDJ96rytPxyQ.text: Oh my gosh it was great let me start off with that. My friend and her dog came to lunch with me around 4 and it was quiet and the for the outside seating it was a beautiful day. If you have a dog or somebody with a dog a dog is coming just remember the restaurants now at least this one wont allow pets inside the gate only on the outside. But I ordered pasta and my friend she ordered salad and we both loved it. Very nice place to be and hang out so I advise you to try it.

nEhTSAsmNAGaeBFpFVZGUQ.text: This is a great place to eat with you family. Food is quick and good !! Call ahead to put your name on the list to heave a seat when you arrive  at this location almost always a wait .

ZoFpNROHjccbECA1UtDvzQ.text: The wife and I always stop at this CPK while visiting Vegas. We shared the chicken quesadilla appetizer while she had the BBQ chicken salad with avocado and I had the Bianco Flat bread with extra mushroom. All of the food was very yummy and served in pleasing portions. I also tried the agave mojito which was very refreshing after walking in from triple digit heat. The waiter was prompt and polite. I would recommend.

zRjsJM6ZSx3hKUk_779Aaw.text: Had lunch here the other day and our server was very attentive. I order the half peach salad and was amazed by the mix of flavors- delicious! Next time, I will have the dressing on the side- too much in my opinion. Cpk also has a small plates menu and the corn guacamole is awesome!

K7LxloPA_4AVbSmZpafeOQ.text: The service was amazing. The food ok. The service was slow which was sad because it wasn't busy. I had the pizza lunch special snd it was a good value. It wasn't anything to exciting just lunch.

l83Z7l_R8P_HDYtGQNbprQ.text: This location is generally pretty good. Although the other day I had the worst experience. We were seated very quickly but after that it took forever for everything.   It took a while for the waitress (Ariel) to come take our drink order, but thankfully once we ordered them it didn't take too long for them to come out. We ordered the avocado egg rolls as an appetizer. They are normally very good, but this time they were barely warm. The food runner who brought them out actually stopped in the middle of the restaurant to text for a minute and then brought our egg rolls. Extremely unprofessional. I was a little irked that our waitress offered all her other tables bread, but not ours. Since we had ordered an appetizer I wasn't too upset, but the inconsistency in the service was irritating. I order pasta for my daughter, which was also barely warm by the time we got it. The barbecue chicken salad we got was pretty good, but the chicken was dry. And then it took forever to get our check. Apparently texting and talking to other waiters was more important to our waitress than attending to her tables. I understand it was a slow time in the restaurant (a Tuesday around 4 pm) but still try to be somewhat attentive.   Overall, the experience was bad and I don't think I will be coming back to this location. There are plenty of other restaurant options in town square.

dwQogqVTlktxI_aa2nXQGA.text: Being on a pizza kick, we are looking for high quality pizza around the valley. The pizza at cpk is about the same quality as some of the other high end chains. The problem here was the service. Unfortunately, our pizza s came out wrong (I had the BBQ chicken with no cheese and hubby the meat cravers, regular.) they reversed the order and his got no cheese. After we flagged down the server, sge apologized and sent them back. Unfortunately, again, she could not keep our drinks full. At one point, I waited so long for a refill, my pizza got cold waiting for a drink. Hubby had to eat  the second half of pizza with nothing to wash it down. His refill never came until after he was done. Very disappointing :(

rbdZKNUw1_OsLhCz86VP2Q.text: This is one of my favorite places to go when shopping. I always get the same thing but this time I was with a friend so we shared a pizza. We got there during the lunch rush and there was a 10 min wait. That was all fine. When my name was called the host said is outside ok? It was a bit cold in the shade and windy so I asked to be inside. She responded with "well outside is all that's available! You'll have to wait another 15!" She wasn't to pleasant about us wanting to sit inside. I really dislike when hosts act like that at a restaurant. My server was very sweet and friendly. Food was good as usual. My experience was great other then the host with a serious attitude. Don't worry, I'll still be back.

u3mdJdy1-iOf6C6OTh6xYA.text: Kyle is an exceptional server! He always takes great care of me and makes fantastic suggestions when I can't decide what I want. Love going to CPK at Town Square!

SkHd9zU5iFhJYdQRsGZ2yw.text: This place is the best! The first time my kids and I walked in ,  the staff made us feel special, everyone was so friendly . The  pizza was very delicious , my kids love their peperoni pizza . I highly recommend this place!

YJ5YLNgX7bueQPFYlQJJOg.text: Every time we come here we always have the best service. Now the food is always great, but it's the service that really makes us keep coming back. Every single waitress we've had works very hard and you can tell they really care about your experience. Definitely the best location in Vegas.

xg7nHuQhArZMq5cYy7aptw.text: I was surprised that I didn't have any trouble getting a seat for the lunch rush. Really loved the Caesar salad! Our server was very attentive. They had a problem with the radio though and, while trying to sorry it out, it briefly sounded like a rock concert blaring. Luckily, that didn't take away from the meal.

iYLQyYT83jSicGwKPZSZsQ.text: Great experience, four cheese ravioli is where it's at. Along with the "trust me its good" butter cake . The best by far for pasta compared to brio and even olive garden.

ghrfZAMvV7Yjn0SDQtdmKQ.text: This place seems to keep going downhill from when we first started going there.  It's in the Town Square shopping area on the strip.  For the money this is not a good bargain place to eat.  Ordered a pasta dish and added chicken.  Very little chicken and very little sauce on the pasta as well.  There was probably only 3 or 4 oz of meat in the pasta for which they charged extra for.  They continually remove favorite items from the menu and now on this last visit I was told no more Tiramisu for desert starting next month.    Another Las Vegas restaurant gets added to my S@#t list and I will look elsewhere to dine.
